product_name: The North Face Amore Down Jacket - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The North Face Amore Down insulated jacket shows off exceptional performance with subtle styling so you'll thrive in cold weather on the mountain. Nylon shell jacket uses HyVent(TM) 3-layer coating for water-resistant, breathable protection. Recylecd polyester embossed taffeta lining eases layering and envelops naturally warm goose down insulation. 550-fill-power goose down provides a high warmth-to-weight ratio; goose down is the lightest, warmest and most compressible insulation available. Features zippered handwarmer pockets (right pocket includes goggles cloth), zippered chest pocket, internal media pocket and goggles stash. The North Face Amore down jacket has an adjustable, insulated hood that easily detaches when not needed. Powder skirt with gripping elastic keeps snow out; attachment loops for coordinating snow pants (not included) create a seamless fit. Hem cinch cord and adjustable cuffs with rip-and-stick closures help seal out cold air while retaining valuable warmth. Buddy lift clip keeps your lift pass close at hand for quick access in line. Closeout.
short_description: The North Face Amore Down insulated jacket shows off exceptional performance with subtle styling so you'll thrive in cold weather on the mountain.
